divs: Sighting DetailsTook my dogs out at 4:30am and saw this spinning red blue green light thru the pine trees. I looked thru field glasses and it was clearly spinning and slowly moving to the south. My wife came outside and saw it too. We have never seen anything like this before!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lakeshore
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I saw spinning red blue green se of Huntington lake between pine trees at 7200 feet
